Summary: hot metal object(red)with black like windows rotating very slowly in a circle
divs: Sighting Detailsi thought i come forward with what i saw that night in august 30,2003 at approx...11:15pm i live on a street that u could see the monterey park hill near monterey pass road..that night i had a smoke, like i do all the time on my front porch..and as i looked towards the hills of monterey park i saw a red spinning object with what appears to be black windows rotating in a circle about 30 rpms covered with red hot glow from this object i can see it is black and of a saucer shape from my point of view it was very close about 3000 feet in front of me and this object was hovering over a house on the hill and it was very close to that house about 300 feet above it, it made no noise..and it was there for about 8 minutes the red hot glow would go out then come back on and when it did go out, i saw a saucer shape craft it was blacker than the night sky. i saw it very clear and it was dripping what seems like molten metal..still spinning slowly just hovering there...after reading the article on this site about the red object over monterey park i know i had the most clear visual of this alien space craft..i never believed in these things but since that night i got more questions than answers...this object was huge about 300 to 400 feet across bigger than a 747 airplane. it hovered over the hill where most of the commercial airplanes fly over..it made me believe that we are being watched...sorry it took me 5 years to tell my story,i had too do some research and watching all those youtube ufos and stuff. i think i had the clearest view of them all...and it was a scary site cause it was so close...and not knowing what this thing might do..this thing is burned into my mind,remembered it like if it where just yesterday..it has been awhile and i haven't seen anything like it since..i didn't take any photos cause i was shocked and my jaws dropped i couldn't take my eyes off this thing..
